notes: Ceremonial Robe is an aura and its buff/debuff lingers for 0.5 seconds.
Reduces most heroes' total magic resistance to 18%, assuming basic 25% magic resistance and no other sources of magic resistance.
abilities.description: Lowers enemy Status Resistance by and Magic Resistance by .

name: Ceremonial Robe
description: One of many items lost in the looting of Zelenwyr's sacred reliquary.
